page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: There are a number of different types of shop in the area which may be grouped as follows: {1.Single shop.}Usually converted from a house. {2.Small cluster.}House conversions.2 or 3 units. {3. Larger cluster.}House conversions {4.Purpose built centre. {5.Hypermarket with car park. Shopping styles are changing to meet the needs of their clients.There is still a demand for the{local corner {shop}to meet the demand for 'fogotten items' and abnormal shopping hours.Larger stores are being developed to meet the local need to provide shops which can supply a very large range of goods and which have ample car parking facilities.
